research_municipality_step.notes: The elected officials for Patton Village city, TX, include the Mayor and five City Council members. Information was gathered from the City of Patton Village website and the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory. There was a minor discrepancy in some meeting minutes regarding Council Member Position 4, but the TML directory and Wikipedia consistently list David Gilliam for this role.

office.name: Council Member - Mayor Pro Tempore - Position 2
